1.2 Remote PostgreSQL connections

```{r}
library(RPostgreSQL)

library(keyring)

keyring_unlock(keyring = "remote_homework")

username <- key_get(service = "omni_postgresql_username", keyring = "remote_homework")

password <- key_get(service = "omni_postgresql_password", keyring = "remote_homework")

keyring_lock(keyring = "remote_homework")

my_db_connection <- dbConnect(drv = PostgreSQL(max.con = 1), user = username, password = password, dbname='cmvhbdgdk', host='34.245.37.126')

```
